评论详情: Good work pant

Good quality, but horribly small. Wranglers are usually true to size, not these. Very tight on thighs, crotch and waist. I'm 5'4' athletic build, 160 lbs. I work ranch work and construction, having quality pants that don't break the bank are important, and I was disappointed.

评论概述: Utility pocket only on left side!
评论详情: would be a lot more useful if utility pocket was on both legs for right handers as well! Other than that great fit, material seems to be durable

I work in automotive manufacturing and these pants hold up so well. I’ve bought them is several colors. Wear them every day. Very durable and comfy. No problems with fit or shrinking. No metal rivits means no paint damage to the vehicles. Can say enough good things about these pants.

评论概述: Runs at least 2 sizes too small
评论详情: I am normally a 28 or size 6. I read they ran small and bought an 8. I could button them but I need a 10 to actually be able to move.
Tela muy buena y son dueaderos
Great fit when you order two sizes up. Im normally a 4 and ordered an 8. Very durable and comfy! Highly recommend

I took the advice of the reviews here and sized up. I’m usually a 6/8 so I got these in a 10 and they fit fine. The material is a nice weight, good color, and enough stretch. They are lower cut than I expected and sit well below my belly button. Also the leg is very wide and straight which is very unflattering on people like me with short legs. On the fence if I’ll keep them. They work for what I wanted to buy them for but I’m having a hard time with how unflattering they look on my legs.
I ordered a size bigger then I usually wear but they were still to small but I did like the the feel of the material and really wished they would have fit
Not my style or body fit
Love the pants! Very durable!!
Sturdy but cool enough for outdoor work in summer. Run a little small in hip/waist. Size 6 was perfect though I usually wear size 4 in everyday pants. Pockets for everything you need!

I needed a pair of pants to work out in the yard in cool temps. I thought these would be great. The fabric and style is nice, I sized up based on reviews. Even with a size up, the waist is so small I would have to buy an extender to wear them, and I'm really petite! The are definitely not appropriately proportioned. Too bad because they would have been perfect. I refuse to modify brand new clothes - Wrangler needs to fix this.

I wear a size 8 in every brand of pants you can imagine, I couldn't even get size 8 on in these pants - went to a 10, they barely fit and were very tight in my thighs and behind, had to go to a 12! Love the look and length! (Yay 34" inseam) but you definitely need to order up a couple sizes!!

评论概述: Runs small, order at least 2 sizes up!
评论详情: I normally wear a size 6 (in Express pants, Banana Republic pants and H&M) so I ordered these in a size 8 and they barely button! other than running small, the material seems sturdy (but does not stretch a lot) and the pockets are roomy.

After reading the reviews I hesitantly bought a size up.  They fit perfectly and the quality is excellent.  They are a thicker fabric, not flimsy.  The price was more than I wanted to pay but after wearing and washing they were so worth the money.  I would love another pair in tan but need to wait to see if they become available.  I am 5'7" and 220 lbs I bought a size 8.  Absolutely love them!
Pant leg fits pretty loose, waist fits tight.

评论概述: They run small order up 2 sizes.
评论详情: These are among my wife's favorite pants. She has worn for two years and the are holding up. Order two sizes larger and you will be less frustrated.

评论概述: Way too low rise and very uncomfortable crotch, poorly made
评论详情: Way too low rise and very uncomfortable crotch, poorly made And pilled after one wash
I had purchased this style previously, and had to have another pair.  I love the way they fit me.
I first bought a pair based on the recommendation by Amazon. The xl is a 6. I wear a 16, I saw they run small so I ordered a 20, they were still too small.

I purchased three pairs and each pair fits differently while one pair specifically has the left leg tighter than the right leg making them extremely uncomfortable. I ended up purchasing 3 pairs of carhartt within a week with these lousy things as back up for work. Nice try.
Bigger than usual 12’s
Comfortable and durable

It was nice that they are long enough because I have really long legs and typically have to order extra long pants. However, they are much looser around the knees and ankles than the picture leads you to think.

I’d would order a size up. I looked at the size chart and decided to go a size bigger then I normally would get, and they’re still tight. I though by butt to waste ratio was normal but I guess not here. They’re super soft jeans though so maybe just order bigger 🤷🏻‍♀️

评论概述: Sizing is so far off, don’t waste your time.
评论详情: I normally wear a 6x34 for a relaxed fit in carhartt.  I followed other reviews and bought a size bigger than normal, these ran at least 3 sizes small. I could not get them anywhere close to even buttoning.  I love the brand for the quality and they make awesome work pants but these were not the same.
Nice work pants

Love these. They fit true to the cowboy cut jeans sizing. Just enough stretch to let you move about comfortably but not so much that they fall off 2 hours after putting them on. If you are used to stretch jeans that you can buy 3 sizes smaller than your true size and cram into them, then you will think they run small and be disappointed at the size you need to order. I use these for working outside several hours almost daily, and they have stood up wonderfully
Per recent reviews they stated these pants run small and I ordered the next larger size and they fit perfectly.

评论概述: Proportioned like petite women's clothes and thin
评论详情: I'm on the fence with these. The material is much thinner than I expected for a work pant, and they seem to be proportioned like petite clothes, so I'm sure they would be perfect for little working gals, but as advertised disappointing. I don't like the pockets much, except that they included the extra on the left. Overall these have a very trouser-y look in person for those that want a more polished look. I ordered based on measurement and where the pants are supposed to sit and the whole crotch area is just too short, so the waist where it tapers in hits well below mid rise and pinches kinda weird. Because of that I'm extremely skeptical that a 2 will be much better because they proportions would still be off quite a bit length wise. Also not a true 30 inseam. Even if it was they really need to add 0x32 as a size option. But considering the way these are proportioned they are really suited for a petite person, not lanky. 5'7" w26, h36,

It’s true order two sizes up. Good thing I read other reviews. I love the pants! Very comfortable and the phone pocket is awesome! The deep front pockets are really nice too! The length is true to size. Will probably by more in a different color.

I read the reviews before ordering, so I knew they would run a bit small. My daughter is normally a size 0. Size 2 fit her perfectly. It's hard to find women's work pants that small. These are great pants at a great price.
Loved these pants. Wish there was black.
They are great but didn't last as long as I would prefer. I wear them twice a week and they wore out from wear in 8 months.

评论概述: Decent attire for a manufacturing environment
评论详情: Order 2 size up and it fits.  The waist area isn't the best, feels like I'm wearing a low rise or as if the crotch area was sewn in reverse.  Nothing but a long shirt that will cover the backside will do if my crack shows when bending over.  Overall, I would buy again.

These run so small...like 2 to 3 sizes. I can't knock the construction - they are well made. No stitching errors, great material, etc. This is the quality we expect from Wrangler, but the big bummer is that they just don't fit... They are thicker material, so make sure you don't expect stretch, etc. IF you want something that will hold up to a worksite or a farm, these are it...just make sure you can get free returns so you can try on some different sizes and find what works for you.

评论概述: Not a women's size 18 for sure
评论详情: I couldn't get these on my hips. I'm a women's size 16 or 18 and these were not a size 18 in women's, maybe in missy sizes, but not in a women or curvy size. I was really hoping to have a nice pair of pants, but they don't fit and even going a size larger won't help because then they will just be huge in all the wrong places.

These size 16 fit appropriately. They sit higher on your belly and the material does not stretch in the waist. The 2 front pockets are very deep, the cell phone pocket is handy. The 32" inseam is a bit too long for me so I'll have to take it in but these could definitely be handy for working out in the garden or in the woods.

These Wrangler work pants for women are comfortable and they are sturdy and well made. Comfort is the key word whether you are doing yard work, helping the hubby clean the attic or working as a flagger at a construction site, these are guaranteed to be comfortable all day.

评论概述: Run very small, but good work pants
评论详情: These run so small. Order at least 2 sizes larger. Nice material and well made, the sizing is just insanely off.  I ordered two pairs in different colors and had to return them and size up. I haven't worn them for work yet, but did some yard work in them and they were great for that.

These are great to wear for yard work. They fit very true to size. I think they are comfortable and durable. They don't cinch in at the waist and give you muffin top, they have plenty of thigh room. They also have roomy pockets, plus a side pocket that is deep enough to slip hand pruners in. I Have enjoyed wearing them.

Sizing is WAY OFF! I’m typically a size 0 in Gap/Banana Republic and was thrilled to find work pants in a size 0. However, I couldn’t even begin to get a size 0 buttoned. So I ordered a size 2, which I was at least able to button but still was too tight to work comfortably in. Too irritated with all the returns to bother with a size 4. Length was fine for me - I’m 5’7” and ordered 30” inseam. Quality was ehhh... obviously didn’t wear them but didn’t feel super heavy or durable.

These are definitely a work pant. Thought they'd be lightweight like a khaki. They are dense, like jeans.  The sizing is a little off. The 32" length was as long as 34" on me. I'm 5'10 & it came over my shoes, a 32".  Like the boot cut but, unlike most boot cuts, not very curvy friendly. I sized up to a 14 vs my reg 12 and it was was tough getting the button to close. Held the 14 up to my 12's and about an inch larger. There is no stretch so size generously ladies.  Like the pants. The quality is there. Wrangler used to be one of my go to's. But my vanity will not let me go up 2 sizes bc I have hips & a bum. They are just gonna be a hard one to buy without trying first.

While the quality of the fabric and the stitching are excellent the cut is way off. There is no way these are a size 12 and there is absolutely no give in the waistband. The fit through the leg is nice and roomy with well placed pockets. Very disappointed since they would be really nice pair otherwise.

These pants seemed to run a little LONG. I ordered them with a 30" inseam, but I was stepping all over the hem when I tried them on. Part of this may be due to the boot-cut style. They were about right, if not a little tight in the waist. I liked the placement of the slit pocket on the leg.
Tough jeans for the working woman. I’ve purchased  these before and will keep purchasing!
La grandeur est bonne
A little tight in the waist but they loosen up after a bit, I'd buy another pair for next season
